22 Business overview Deterring fraud 
Deterring fraud
 
Aegon has measures in place to deter fraud among employees, intermediaries and third parties. These include mandatory training, as 
well as company programs to raise awareness of issues such as corruption, bribery, money laundering and insider dealing. Provisions to tackle financial crime are contained in the company’s Code of Conduct, its Business Principles and its Global Financial Crime Notification and Reporting Procedure. Aegon also records all incidents of fraud and, where appropriate, will take steps to prosecute culprits. 
Reported incidents of fraud involving intermediaries rose sharply last year as Aegon introduced more effective detection systems in 
Central & Eastern Europe, India and China. Incidents of fraud involving third parties also increased.
